name: chronochat
description: ChronoChat - The Time Travel Social Network

scripts.start: npm run build-local && npm run start-server
scripts.dev: echo "Run 'npm run watch-local' in one terminal and 'npm run start-server' in another for concurrent development."
scripts.build-dist: npm run clean-dist && mkdir dist && tsc --outDir dist && copyfiles -u 1 *.html *.css metadata.json dist && copyfiles -f dist/landing.js dist
scripts.//: The deploy script below is an example; use Cloud Code UI or gcloud for actual deployment and API_KEY management.
scripts.deploy-example: echo 'Remember to replace YOUR_ACTUAL_API_KEY_HERE with your real key if using this script, or better, set it as an environment variable in Cloud Run settings.' && npm run build && gcloud run deploy chronochat-app --source . --region us-west1 --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars API_KEY=YOUR_ACTUAL_API_KEY_HERE
